result.html: D'imigh an chéad traein orainnWe missed the first train.
result.ponchtml: D'imiġ an ċéad traein orainnWe missed the first train.

result.eng: We will have to examine the case again.
result.ga: Beidh orainn breathnú ar an chás arís
result.orig: Beidh orainn breathnú ar an chás arís
result.html: Beidh orainn breathnú ar an chás arísWe will have to examine the case again.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ orainn breaṫnú ar an ċás arísWe will have to examine the case again.

result.eng: We will have to pay the funeral costs.
result.ga: Beidh orainn costas na sochraide a íoc
result.orig: Beidh orainn costas na sochraide a íoc
result.html: Beidh orainn costas na sochraide a íocWe will have to pay the funeral costs.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ orainn costas na soċraide a íocWe will have to pay the funeral costs.

result.eng: We'll have to wait until Budget Day.
result.ga: Beidh orainn fanacht go Lá na Cáinaisnéise
result.orig: Beidh orainn fanacht go Lá na Cáinaisnéise
result.html: Beidh orainn fanacht go Lá na CáinaisnéiseWe'll have to wait until Budget Day.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ orainn fanaċt go Lá na CáinaisnéiseWe'll have to wait until Budget Day.

result.eng: She threatened to take us to court.
result.html: Bhagair sí an dlí orainnShe threatened to take us to court.
result.ponchtml: Ḃagair sí an dlí orainnShe threatened to take us to court.

result.eng: We were frustrated because of the lack of good dictionaries.
result.ga: Bhí frustrachas orainn mar gheall ar an easpa foclóirí maithe
result.orig: Bhí frustrachas orainn mar gheall ar an easpa foclóirí maithe
result.html: Bhí frustrachas orainn mar gheall ar an easpa foclóirí maitheWe were frustrated because of the lack of good dictionaries.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí frustraċas orainn mar ġeall ar an easpa foclóirí maiṫeWe were frustrated because of the lack of good dictionaries.

result.eng: We has to sleep in the same room. We had to share a room.
result.ga: Bhí orainn codladh in aon seomra
result.orig: Bhí orainn codladh in aon seomra
result.html: Bhí orainn codladh in aon seomraWe has to sleep in the same room. We had to share a room.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí orainn codlaḋ in aon seomraWe has to sleep in the same room. We had to share a room.

result.html: Tá siad timpeall orainnThey are around us.
result.ponchtml: Tá siad timpeall orainnThey are around us.

result.eng: It is almost certain that we will be late.
result.ga: Tá sé geall le cinnte go mbeidh moill orainn
result.orig: Tá sé geall le cinnte go mbeidh moill orainn
result.html: Tá sé geall le cinnte go mbeidh moill orainnIt is almost certain that we will be late.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé geall le cinnte go mbeiḋ moill orainnIt is almost certain that we will be late.

result.eng: She was born and raised in Ros an Mhíl, but we live in Leitir Mucú now.
result.ga: Rugadh agus tógadh í i Ros an Mhíl ach tá cónaí orainn i Leitir Mucú anois
result.orig: Rugadh agus tógadh í i Ros an Mhíl ach tá cónaí orainn i Leitir Mucú anois
result.html: Rugadh agus tógadh í i Ros an Mhíl ach tá cónaí orainn i Leitir Mucú anoisShe was born and raised in Ros an Mhíl, but we live in Leitir Mucú now.
result.ponchtml: Rugaḋ agus tógaḋ í i Ros an Ṁíl aċ tá cónaí orainn i Leitir Mucú anoisShe was born and raised in Ros an Mhíl, but we live in Leitir Mucú now.

result.eng: We were scared shitless that the bus would be late.
result.ga: Bhí eagla ár gcraicinn orainn go gcuirfidís moill ar an mbus
result.orig: Bhí eagla ár gcraicinn orainn go gcuirfidís moill ar an mbus
result.html: Bhí eagla ár gcraicinn orainn go gcuirfidís moill ar an mbusWe were scared shitless that the bus would be late.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí eagla ár gcraicinn orainn go gcuirfidís moill ar an mbusWe were scared shitless that the bus would be late.

result.eng: We are subject to obligations by virtue of our membership in the European Union.
result.ga: Leagtar dualgais orainn go reachtúil de bhua ár mballraíochta san Aontas Eorpach
result.orig: Leagtar dualgais orainn go reachtúil de bhua ár mballraíochta san Aontas Eorpach
result.html: Leagtar dualgais orainn go reachtúil de bhua ár mballraíochta san Aontas EorpachWe are subject to obligations by virtue of our membership in the European Union.
result.ponchtml: Leagtar dualgais orainn go reaċtúil de ḃua ár mballraíoċta san Aontas EorpaċWe are subject to obligations by virtue of our membership in the European Union.

result.eng: He had dogs with him. All I remember is their teeth snarling at us.
result.ga: Bhí madraí leis Ní cuimhin liom ach a gcuid fiacla ag drannadh orainn
result.orig: Bhí madraí leis Ní cuimhin liom ach a gcuid fiacla ag drannadh orainn
result.html: Bhí madraí leis Ní cuimhin liom ach a gcuid fiacla ag drannadh orainnHe had dogs with him. All I remember is their teeth snarling at us.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí madraí leis Ní cuiṁin liom aċ a gcuid fiacla ag drannaḋ orainnHe had dogs with him. All I remember is their teeth snarling at us.

result.eng: 'They're coming to get us!' yelled one of the young men and we all rejoiced.
result.ga: Tá siad ag teacht faoinár ndéin liúigh duine de na fir óga agus bhí gliondar croí orainn go léir
result.orig: Tá siad ag teacht faoinár ndéin liúigh duine de na fir óga agus bhí gliondar croí orainn go léir
result.html: Tá siad ag teacht faoinár ndéin liúigh duine de na fir óga agus bhí gliondar croí orainn go léir'They're coming to get us!' yelled one of the young men and we all rejoiced.
result.ponchtml: Tá siad ag teaċt faoinár ndéin liúiġ duine de na fir óga agus ḃí gliondar croí orainn go léir'They're coming to get us!' yelled one of the young men and we all rejoiced.

result.eng: Will we have to put up with this whimpering for long?
result.ga: An mbeidh orainn cur suas leis an ngeonaíl seo ar feadh i bhfad
result.orig: An mbeidh orainn cur suas leis an ngeonaíl seo ar feadh i bhfad
result.html: An mbeidh orainn cur suas leis an ngeonaíl seo ar feadh i bhfadWill we have to put up with this whimpering for long?
result.ponchtml: An mbeiḋ orainn cur suas leis an ngeonaíl seo ar feaḋ i ḃfadWill we have to put up with this whimpering for long?
